about_the_game:
Lost in the Spring - Art Book
Pixel Art Collection and Game Visuals

The "Lost in the Spring - Art Book" is a visual collection of pixel art and visuals created for the indie game Haru to Shura. This book focuses on the beautifully crafted pixel art backgrounds, CGs, and main visuals that define the game's atmosphere.

In addition to the core visuals, the book also includes early concept sketches, character profiles for Yoru and Chihiro, as well as a glimpse into the development process through light commentary from the creator. Whether you want to explore the game’s art in detail or discover its behind-the-scenes elements, this art book offers a complete visual journey into the world of Haru to Shura.

Note 1:This publication includes translations generated using AI tools.
Note 2: All language versions are included in the download. Don’t be surprised!

How to Activate and Access the DLC:

  • Go to your Steam Library and open the Haru to Shura page. Click the ⚙️ icon in the top-right corner, then select Properties.

  • In the new window, click DLC from the menu on the left and check the box next to Lost in the Spring - Art Book.

  • Wait a moment for the DLC to install.

  • Once installed, go back to the Haru to Shura page in your Steam Library. Click the ⚙️ icon again, then select Manage → Browse Local Files.

  • You’ll find the ArtBook folder stored there 📕.
